title: Stuck Reconnecting
body:
After winning a ranked game and the end game stats screen being black, i tried skipping it which lead to my friend and i getting  stuck on the reconnect screen. i've tried relogging and leaving but it doesnt work.
being relogging and waiting about 40 mins now =(
┬┴┬┴┤(･_├┬┴┬┴ Hello darkness, my old friend.

replies.body: welp its resolved, sadly i didnt get any LP for my win doe

It's so dark and lonely
HELP!
I am that friend and this guy is boosted. But I'm not boosted and I'm stuck too. Help me.
